DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of the present pilot study is to determine the feasibility of using MRI and MRE to evaluate the liver in infants with suspected liver disease.
DOC.criteria: Infants < 6 months of age Known liver disease based (liver enzymes, bilirubin, and/or GGT at least twice the upper limit of normal for age) Parental/LAR permission obtained Standard MRI exclusion criteria as set forth by the CCHMC Division of Radiology Severe coagulopathy (INR > 3 or platelets <50,000)
